title: Zoner Photo Studio 15 PRO Pre-Activated [JUHAX69X]
description:
Zoner Photo Studio 15 PRO Pre-Activated
 
 
This is Pre-Activated "Giveaway" version. No serials needed. Just install and start using.
 
 
 
Zoner Photo Studio is a professional software application designed to help you
organize your image collection, and perform various editing operations.

Although it comes packed with a wide range of features, the program sports a clean
and intuitive GUI that offers users the possibility to import images from the
directories stored in your computer, camera, scanner, or card.

Zoner Photo Studio offers support for a wide range of file formats, namely JPEG, PNG,
PCX, GIF, ICO, BMI, TGA, RAW, PSD, PGM, EMF, EPS, PDF, XAR, CDR, and others.
 
Compared to industry-standard suites that can cost thousands of dollars,
Zoner Photo Studio provides an affordable and easy-to-use alternative.
 
 
 
Features:
 
Advanced photo manager supports searches & sorting for keywords, GPS, and more.
Catalog with endless filtering possibilities. Fast and easy browsing and viewing.
 
Handy Quick Filters and Quick Edits in Editor. Professional-class noise reduction.
Convenient yet powerful RAW processing with 16-bit color support.
 
Direct uploading of photos to Google Picasa Web Album, Facebook, Flickr, and Zonerama.
Automatic backups of picturesÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ original versions when they are changed.
 
Integrated CUDA/OpenCL technology, for harnessing the full power of modern graphics cards.
